metadata.title: CVE-2024-21823 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Hardware logic with insecure de-synchronization in Intel(R) DSA andIntel(R) IAA for some Intel(R) 4th or 5th generation Xeon(R) processors mayallow an authorized user to potentially enable denial of service via localaccess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21823` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1062-gcp - 5.15.0-1062.70~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency - 5.15.0-110.120~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-110-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-110.120~20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
